jobTitle: QC Scientist - Bioanalytical, FACS, ELISA, qPCR
jobDescription: The QC Scientist is responsible for performing as a subject matter expert in the completion of the Quality Control bioanalytical testing or data review in direct support of clinical manufacturing / assay transfer activities. This includes the ability to interface with multiple groups and the ability to independently perform tasks, interpret results, and troubleshoot. Additionally, this position will be responsible for training and may participate in assay transfer.
